div.bibl: Russkii Viestnik (Russian Herald), Sep. 24, 1924. RUSSIAN BALLET STUDIO

body.p: Mme. A. N. Maximov, a graduate of the State Theatrical School in St. Petersburg and an artist of the Mariinsky Theater, has opened, together with the well known Russian ballet master, Boris Petrov, a ballet studio in Chicago, downtown. Temporarily the studio is located at the McVickers Theater. Lessons at the studio began on September 15, 1924.
